title: Yamicsoft Windows 10 Manager 10.0.8 + Patch
description:
Windows 10 Manager from Yamicsoft is a system utility that helps you optimize, tweak, repair and clean up your Windows 10. It will increase your system speed, eliminate system fault, improve system security and meet all of your expectations. 



Yamicsoft Windows 10 Manager features:

Information:

Get detailed system and all hardware information on your system; help you find out the installation key of Windows, Microsoft Office products; show all detailed information of running processes and threats on your machine; Windows 10 Manager offers 1-Clicking Cleaner that cleans your system automatically; the Repair Center helps you to fix various system problems.



Optimizer:

Tweak your system to improve the Windows Startup and Shutdown speed, tweak your hardware to increase system speed and performance; Control what is started on the Windows Startup, check and repair the advancved startup items to restore the malicious change by viruses; Tune up and optimize the system services and Task Schedule; turn off smartly some unnecessary system services and tasks to improve system performance.



Cleaner:

Find out which files or folders engross your disk space and shown with chart. Smart Uninstaller can fully delete programs from your system without residual files and Registry entries. Find and clean junk files to increase your HAard Disk Space. The Duplicate Files Finder can scan your whole computer for files with the same size, name, folder and modification time. Registry Cleaner checks and repair incorrectly linked Registry entries. RegistryDefrag rebuilds and re-indexes your Registry to reduce registry access time and therefore improve application responsiveness. Desktop Cleasner can clean all useless icons and files on your Desktop easily.



Customuization:

Customize the look of your system by tweaking SAystem Explorer, Start Menu, Taskbar and Notification Area. Manage the pinned items and can pin any files or folders to Taskbar and Start Screen. Create the quick startup items on Taskbar with the Jump List Launcher. Tune up the Windows 10 boot menu. Edit context menu's of mouse Right-Clicking. Edit easily the Win + X menu that shown when right-click on Desktop bottem-left corner or Win + X keyboard shortcut. Create the shortcut that executed quick on run dialog box. Visual Customizer can change system and file type icons, change the lock screen image automatically.



Security:

Improve system security by tweaking system components, UAC (User Account Control) and login settings. Tune up System Restore options. Hide and restrict to access drives and programs. Encrypt/decrypt files, move system folders to safe locations. Undelete the files that accidentally deleted or formatted on disk. Privacy Protector can maintain your personal privacy by eliminating the tracks that you leave behind. Hide or delete the Control Panel entries.



Network:

Optimize your internet connection speed, manage all shared items. Tweak your Internet Explorer (IE) easily. IP Switcher can switch your IP address easily on different networks. Edits the Hosts file to speed up surfing the internet and permit only to access the specified Hosts.



Misc Utilities:

Show the collection of Windows utilitities and pin system iterms to Start Screen and Taskbar. Split and merge any files. Automatically back up files regularly using Super Copy. Registry Tools help you to operate Registry easily.



Changelog (Update 2-9-2016):

- Some programs and the Multi-Language feature
- Perfect some functions
- Fix the bugs



Don't hit and run! A minimal seed time required, the maximum seed time desired. Please seed dor as long ass youn are able to keep this torrent alive!
